  • Constructor Details

    • AlbumController

      public AlbumController()

  • Method Details

    • initData

      public void initData(Album selectedAlbum, ArrayList<User> controlLolerList, User currentUser)
      Initializes the controller with the selected album, the list of users, and the current user. Sets up the cell factory for the photoListView to display thumbnails of the photos. Disables buttons based on whether a photo is selected or not. Adds a listener to the selection model of the photoListView to enable/disable buttons accordingly.
      Parameters:
      selectedAlbum - the album selected by the user
      controlLolerList - the list of users
      currentUser - the current user

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the "Add Photo" button is clicked. Displays a file chooser dialog to allow the user to select a photo. Checks if the selected photo already exists in any other album and adds a reference to it. If the photo is new, prompts the user to enter a caption and creates a new Photo object. Adds the photo to the current album and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Add Photo" button

    • removePhoto

      public void removePhoto()
      Handles the event when the "Remove Photo" button is clicked. Removes the selected photo from the current album and updates the UI.

    • captionPhoto

      public void captionPhoto()
      Handles the event when the "Caption Photo" button is clicked. Creates a text input dialog to allow the user to edit the caption of the selected photo. Updates the caption of the selected photo and refreshes the list view.

    • addTag

      public void addTag()
      Handles the event when the "Add Tag" button is clicked. Creates a dialog to prompt the user for a tag name and value. Adds the new tag to the selected photo and updates the UI.

    • removeTag

      public void removeTag()
      Handles the event when the "Remove Tag" button is clicked. Creates a dialog to allow the user to select a tag to remove from the selected photo. Removes the selected tag from the photo and updates the tag label.

    • displayPhoto

      public void displayPhoto()
      Handles the event when the "Display Photo" button is clicked. Creates a new stage to display the selected photo, including its tags and caption. Provides navigation buttons to move to the previous or next photo.

    • goBack

      public void goBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the "Go Back" button is clicked. Saves the updated user list to the file and switches the view to the UserView.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Go Back" button

    • move

      public void move()
      Handles the event when the "Move" button is clicked. Retrieves the selected photo and the source album. Prompts the user to select the destination album and moves the photo to the new album. Updates the UI to reflect the changes.

    • copy

      public void copy()
      Handles the event when the "Copy" button is clicked. Retrieves the selected photo and the destination album. Adds a reference of the selected photo to the destination album. Updates the UI to reflect the changes.

    • selectDestinationAlbum

      private Album selectDestinationAlbum()
      Selects the destination album for the "Move" or "Copy" operations. Displays a ChoiceDialog to allow the user to choose the destination album from the list of available albums. Returns the selected Album object or null if no album is selected.
      Returns:
      the selected destination Album, or null if no album is selected

    • navigatePhoto

      private void navigatePhoto(int offset)
      Navigates to the previous or next photo in the photoListView. Updates the display of the selected photo, including the tag label.
      Parameters:
      offset - the offset to apply when navigating (e.g., -1 for previous, 1 for next)

    • updateTagLabel

      public void updateTagLabel(Photo selectedPhoto)
      Updates the tag label to display the tags associated with the selected photo.
      Parameters:
      selectedPhoto - the selected Photo object

    • displaySelectedPhoto

      private void displaySelectedPhoto()
      Displays the selected photo in the image view, including the tags, caption, and date taken.

    • findPhotoByFilePath

      private Photo findPhotoByFilePath(String filePath)
      Finds a Photo object by its file path in the list of users and their albums.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path of the photo to find
      Returns:
      the Photo object with the given file path, or null if not found

    • saveUsersToFile

      public void saveUsersToFile(ArrayList<User> users)
      Saves the list of users to a file.
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users to save
